Revamping my personal site

Jan 4, 2017

My personal site is in need of a face lift, so I spent some time today mocking up a few design interations in Sketch.

personal site wireframe

I want to make it minimal while still conveying my diverse breadth of experience.

This design seems a little overwhelming. I need to take more time to think out the userflow.

Sidenote, I'm back in the hospital with my girlfriend again. I might have to make this place my second office ⍨.
